Sentence.string: I suspect the victim was poisoned with hemlock. What do you think about that ?
Impossible. This plant causes strong muscle contractions. I would have seen it during the autopsy. Who do you think I am ?
This is the answer I was expecting. Now, if I tell you that the victim used to take opium. Do you still think the same ?

Everything’s changed ! Why didn’t you start by this point ? Now it is possible, it would explain why I didn’t see any contraction during the autopsy. Opium has the property to relax muscles. But it would be needed to mix it in the same solution than the hemlock.
That’s what I thought. Thank you for confirming it.
